snippet: Roger Federer won the decisive singles match Sunday to give Switzerland a 3-2 win at home over Kazakhstan and a spot in the Davis Cup semifinals for the first time in 11 years.
abstract: Roger Federer wins decisive singles match to give Switzerland a 3-2 victory over Kazakhstan and a spot in the Davis Cup semifinals for the first time in 11 years; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won the decisive singles match Sunday to give Switzerland a 3-2 win at home over Kazakhstan and a spot in the Davis Cup semifinals for the first time in 11 years.

headline.main: Swiss Beat Kazakhs to Advance in Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: Swiss Beat Kazakhs to Advance in Davis Cup
